DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator want ass effect peritonisation c-section postoperative vital sign think indirect finding secondary increase sympathetic activity originate pain cause stretch peritoneum .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Visceral Parietal Peritoneum Suturation Postoperative Vital Signs
DOC.detailed_description: At c-section subject randomise four group : Group1 : Only visceral peritoneum close Group 2 : Only parietal peritoneum close Group 3 : Both close Group 4 : None close During postoperative period patient undergo vital sign screen include urine output , blood pressure measurement , pulse rate VAS score determine post operative 6th hour 24th hour .
DOC.criteria: Women underwent uncomplicated csection Patient systemic Diseases Pregnant Obstetric complication Pregnant two previous csections
